title: CCK Podcast: Giving Up (for Lent)
description:
Everyone picks something to give up for Lent. Feitelberg picks peeing his pants. We to drop the L-bomb. Jared doesn't know how to use a hot tub. Everyone hates the Astros.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
